â€œYouth Boiling Pointâ€ is a New Media initiative for Hong Kong Catholic Youth; a platform to share faith, creativity, formation and evangelisation.
It was created by Hong Kong Diocesan Audio-Visual Centre and Hong Kong Diocesan Youth Commission in 2016. Starting from May 2022, Hong Kong Diocesan Youth Commission oversees the management and development of the platform.
